game.name: Astronook
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An astronomy game where you can explore space from your cozy office. Map out constellations, photograph planets and discover the hidden wonders of space.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An astronomy game where you can explore space from your cozy office. Map out constellations, photograph planets and discover the hidden wonders of space.
